I gotta agree with the dawg on this one. I had a friend who tried 
turning all his characters into "Godlike" beings he was eventually 
worked out of the group.

Technology does advance, but only through trial and error, not 
through magik and luck. (Example, you found this thing, how do you 
know what it is without running tests, experiments, and checking with 
other scientific transformers first. check your characters function 
if he's not a scientist then he wouldn't have the necessary abilities 
to do the tests and would need someone to do them for you/him.

 --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Shomin95@a... wrote:
> Ok you come back and seem all nice so one so forth, then out of the 
blue you 
> start to criticize everything that I have done in your absence! its 
like you 
> think im trying to destroy the RPG!!!! My god I hope your not High 
on the 
> council!!!!!!!
